item.description:
Let's bring attention to the anti-liberty, nonconservative record of Mitt Romney.

There should be a lot of press at this event, as Mitt Romney is scheduled to officially announce his running the day before. How big a group of liberty-supporters could we have there making use of the press coverage?

Sign Ideas:
* Did you forget about RomneyCare?
* True conservatives don't support gun control.
* Romney, Taxachusetts called. They want their RINO back.
* New Hampshire ≠ Massachusetts.

**** NOTE: This event is not in support of any one candidate, but rather to call attention to the lack of conservative principles that Mitt Romney has shown. I would advise against bringing signs that promote a specific candidate, lest those who may be upset by our criticisms form negative associations. Our goal is solely to encourage those attending to think critically.

[ Facebook event ]
item.name: Rally in Defense of Liberty at Mitt Romney's "Manchester Town Hall"
